anya-e0105n21:1_1: moraṇḍagāme brāhmaṇakule jāto, so tīsu vedesu ceva sabbavijjāsippaganthesu ca pāraṅgato
anya-e0105n21:1_2: hutvā buddhasāsanadhammaṁ sutvā tampi uggaṇhitukāmo tasmiṁyeva dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe
anya-e0105n21:1_3: ekasmiṁ theravādikavihāre mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ revatattherappamukhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike
anya-e0105n21:1_4: pabbajjañceva upasampadañca gaṇhitvā piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhi. So evaṁ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhantoyeva
anya-e0105n21:1_6: ca tassa visiṭṭhañāṇappabhāvasampannabhāvaṁ ñatvā “imassa buddhasāsane kittighoso
anya-e0105n21:1_7: buddhassa viya pavattissatī”ti sampassamānā “buddhaghoso”ti nāmamakaṁsu. Tena vuttaṁ
anya-e0105n21:2_0: So evaṁ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhitvā madarasa nagarasamīpaṭṭhānabhūte mayūradūtapaṭṭanamhi
anya-e0105n21:2_1: ca kañcipurādīsu ca vasanto andhakaṭṭhakathāya paricayaṁ katvā tāya asantuṭṭhacitto
anya-e0105n21:2_2: sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsupi paricayaṁ kātukāmo tā ca pāḷibhāsamāropetvā abhinavīkātumāsīsanto
anya-e0105n21:2_3: sīhaḷadīpamagamāsi. Tasmiñca kāle sīhaḷadīpe mahānāmo nāma rājā rajjaṁ kāreti, so
anya-e0105n21:2_4: ca rājā abhayagirivāsīsu pasanno teyeva visesato paggaṇhāti.
anya-e0105n21:3_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā evaṁ vadanti “ācariyabuddhaghosassa sīhaḷadīpāgamanena
anya-e0105n21:3_1: sirimeghavaṇṇarājakālato (846-bu-va) puretaraṁyeva bhavitabba”nti. Idañca nesaṁ kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0105n21:3_2: tassa rañño navavassakāle (855-bu-va) buddhassa dāṭhādhātukaliṅgaraṭṭhato sīhaḷadīpamānītā,
anya-e0105n21:3_3: tato paṭṭhāya sīhaḷarājāno anusaṁvaccharaṁ mahantaṁ dhātupūjāussavaṁ karonti. Yadi
anya-e0105n21:3_4: ca ācariyabuddhaghoso tato pacchā sīhaḷadīpamāgaccheyya, tampi pāsādikaṁ mahussavaṁ
anya-e0105n21:3_5: disvā attano ganthesu pakāseyya yathā phāhiyaṁ nāma cinabhikkhu mahānāmarājakāle
anya-e0105n21:3_6: (953-975-bu-va) taṁ disvā attano addhānakkamakathāyaṁ pakāsesi, na pana ācariyassa
anya-e0105n21:3_7: ganthesu taṁpakāsanā dissati, tenetaṁ ñāyati “ācariyabuddhaghoso dāṭhādhātusampattakālato
anya-e0105n21:3_8: (855-bu-va) puretaraṁyeva sīhaḷadīpamāgantvā aṭṭhakathāyo akāsī”ti. Taṁ pana na daḷhakāraṇaṁ
anya-e0105n21:3_9: hoti, tipiṭakapāḷiyā hi atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya yaṁ vā taṁ vā attano paccakkhadiṭṭhaṁ pakāsetabbaṁ
anya-e0105n21:3_10: na hoti, na ca atthasaṁvaṇṇanā addhānakkamakathāsadisā. Kiñca bhiyyo, samantapāsādikāya
anya-e0105n21:3_11: vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ dīpavaṁsatopi kiñci ānetvā pakāsitaṁ, dīpavaṁse ca yāva mahāsenarājakālā
anya-e0105n21:3_13: dīpavaṁsoyeva likhito na bhaveyya. Yadi ca aṭṭhakathāyo tato pubbeyeva katā bhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n21:4: Ācariyabuddhaghoso pana sīhaḷadīpaṁ pattakāle (965-bu-va) mahāvihārameva gantvā tattha sīhaḷamahātherānaṁ santike sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo suṇi. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṁ –
anya-e0105n21:8: Vinayaññussa dhīrassa, sutvā therassa santike”ti pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n21:9_0: Iminā pana aṭṭhakathāvacanena mahāaṭṭhakathādīnaṁ tissannaṁyeva aṭṭhakathānaṁ sutabhāvo
anya-e0105n21:9_1: dassito. Samantapāsādikāyaṁ pana saṅkhepaandhakaṭṭhakathānampi vinicchayo dassitoyeva,
anya-e0105n21:9_2: kasmā pana tā ācariyena sīhaḷattherānaṁ santike na sutāti? Tāsu hi andhakaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0105n21:9_3: tāva andhakaraṭṭhikabhāvato, kataparicayabhāvato ca na sutāti pākaṭoyevāyamattho.
anya-e0105n21:9_4: Saṅkhepaṭṭhakathā pana mahāpaccariṭṭhakathāya saṁkhittamattabhāvato na sutāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n21:9_5: Tathā hi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṁ ganthārambhasaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ vijira. ṭī. ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā
anya-e0105n21:9_7: sārattha. ṭī. 1.92 pācittiyakaṇḍa; vi. vi. ṭī. 1.ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā pana andhakasaṅkhepaṭṭhakathānaṁ
anya-e0105n21:9_8: saṅgahitabhāvo vutto, samantapāsādikāyañca cūḷapaccarīti nāmaṁ kuhiñcipi na dissati,
anya-e0105n21:9_9: mahāṭṭhakathā mahāpaccarī kurundī andhakasaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāti imāniyeva nāmāni dissanti,
anya-e0105n21:9_10: bahūsu ca ṭhānesu “saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana mahāpaccariyañca vutta”ntiādinā pārā.
anya-e0105n21:9_11: aṭṭha. 1.94 dvinnampi samānavinicchayo dassito. Tasmā vajirabuddhiyaṁ cūḷapaccarīti
anya-e0105n21:9_12: vuttaṭṭhakathā mahāpaccarito uddharitvā saṅkhepena kataṭṭhakathā bhaveyya, sā ca
anya-e0105n21:9_13: saṅkhepena katattā saṅkhepaṭṭhakathā nāma jātā bhaveyya. Evañca sati mahāpaccariyā
anya-e0105n21:9_14: sutāya sāpi sutāyeva hotīti na sā ācariyena sutāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n21:10_4: saṅghapālādayo therā taṁ visuddhimaggādiganthānaṁ karaṇatthāya visuṁ visuṁ āyāciṁsu.
anya-e0105n21:10_5: Ettha ca ācariyassa yathāvuttaguṇehi sampannabhāvo attano vacaneneva pākaṭo. Vuttañhi
anya-e0105n21:12_1: mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ visuddhattheravādīnaṁ desanānayasaṅkhāte sakasamaye ca mahāsaṅghikādimahāyānikapariyosānānaṁ
anya-e0105n21:12_2: nikāyantarabhūtānaṁ paresaṁ piṭakaganthantaravādanayasaṅkhāte parasamaye ca tathā
anya-e0105n21:12_4: tesaṁ sakasamayaparasamayānaṁ durogāhadubbodhatthasaṅkhāte gahanaṭṭhānepi ca ogāhituṁ
anya-e0105n21:12_5: samatthoti dīpeti. Paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatoti padena ācariyabuddhaghosatthero porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo
